name: Poppin Puffins #3
description:
An initial collection of 100 highly social and delightful puffins. They enjoy each other’s company and are quite curious. Not to be confused with penguins.

**Properties:**
Background: Orange, Body: Natural, Head: Paper Boat Teal, Beak: Natural, Eyes: Natural, Face: Natural, Face: Natural

**A Good Cause:**
We will donate 10% of all royalties received to charities that work for the protection of wild birds.

**Sponsored by Iceland:**
This Poppin Puffin is officially sponsored by RIFF - The Reykjavik International Film Festival (https://riff.is/). Iceland is the home of the puffin, and we are proud to partner with the Reykjavik International Film Festival to bring awareness to Icelandic filmmakers and help promote conservation of their national bird through NFTs.

**About the Artist:**
Jeroen de Boer - The Olifants (https://theolifants.com/) is a graffiti artist and graphic designer from the Netherlands. He has painted walls and worked for brands across the world.
